DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare in patients with primary hypertension, the non-blood pressure lowering effects of one-year therapy with olmesartan medoxomil vs. those of atenolol on changes in the vascular structure and function.
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Improvement With Olmesartan Medoxomil Study
DOC.criteria: Male or female 1875 years of age Mean seated diastolic BP 90109 or mean seated systolic BP of 140179 Secondary hypertension Renal disease Diabetes mellitus Serum creatinine >3.0 mg/dL Hemoglobin <10 mg/dL (males) or <9mg/dL (females) WBC count <2000 cells/mL Platelet count <100,000 cells/mL Either ALT & AST >2.5 x upper limit of normal BMI >35 kg/m2 TIA or cerebrovascular attack within 3 months of study entry
